phrases: Since no one's home, Sakura's left me
lots and LOTS of goodies to eat!
I guess now Sakura should be enjoying in the snow as white as this pudding.
I just can move without falling.
But, you are really good Tomoyo-chan!
You are good at both ice-skating and skiing!
My mother's had me in lessons ever since I was little.
This is your first time, is not it?
And you are doing so well after only an hour'
You really can do everything, cannot you?
You are doing well, too, Sakura.
In ancient times, they used to ski in sandals.
very difficult to glide in sandals.
And they were a meter long too.
They had special skiing sandals back then?
They would load their baggage on the extra length.
And if there was no snow'
They would be in big trouble'
So, they would do most of their transporting while running very fast.
And they would have contests to see who could run fastest in their sandals.
The sport of skiing was developed.
With Hiiragizawa-kun in on it, I cannot be sure whether they are telling the truth or not'
At least the two of them are enjoying themselves.
He is going to hit the tree!
You still have some things to learn, do not you'?
But I am sure you will manage.
Skiing is fun, is not it?
Yes, you have improved a lot since this morning, Sakura-chan.
You are doing really well for your first time, too, Naoko-chan!
Is it really ok for you to spend your free-time helping me?
Should not we go help Rika-chan?
I think the two of them are alright on their own.
Do you know a ghost story about these mountains?
Does anyone else have a story?
I have heard there are lots of ghosts in England.
Can you tell us a story?
Deep in the oldest mountains, or so I have heard it told,
When the sky is darkened with storm clouds,
A cold wind blows down from the highest peaks.
Then, the snow rises up to blind you'
Yuki-onna is the wandering spirit who comforts the souls of those who freeze to death.
Is not that a Japanese story?
Why not tell one from England?
I thought this one would be better.
Bu' but we do not have to worry about that here, do we?
Well then, time to hit the sack.
It would be wonderful to meet her.
I still do not want to.
The story was not really very scary, though'
Do you not like scary stories, Sakura-san?
You should have said something, then'
But Naoko-chan likes them so much'
Are not you afraid of anything, Eriol-kun?
I heard you call my name'
Thank you for what you did today.
I was scared, so you pointed out that it was time to sleep.
Is that you really mean this?
You are a really nice guy.
What is that supposed to mean?
Let us go outside for a bit!
You made a stuffed bear, too, did not you?
Have you given it away yet?
Yukito-san will be glad to get it.
I was only attracted by his magic.
It is someone else that I care for'
The person I really care about is'
I should not force you to tell.
We will catch a cold if we stay out too long.
You have improved, as well, Li.
From now on is free time.
Do what you want until noon.
you should be ready for a higher-level slope.
What do you think, Shao Lan-kun?
He has improved much for one day.
He is good at sports, is not he?
I think there is more to it than that.
It is really coming down, is not it?
Would it be better to stop for a rest?
I would like to keep going.
I thought I would try the next-level hill.
Will you come with me, Tomoyo-chan?
I will wait at the bottom'
It is really coming down now'
a cold wind blows down from the highest peaks.
Then, the snow rises up to blind you'
It seems a blizzard is on the way.
We should find shelter, once we get off the lift.
It will be dangerous to ski'
We will not be able to see much.
It reminds me of Hiiragizawa-kun's story, yesterday.
Has anyone seen Sakura-chan or Hiiragizawa-kun?
They do not seem to have come in, yet.
They must still be up there!
No one's there, and the door is locked.
It is gotten so dark' and the snow's too thick.
I meant to say that it looks like the weather in my story'
I did not think my story would frighten you so much.
Perhaps I should not have told it.
Everyone below will be buried in the snow.
He could be hurt while I was busy.
I will have to use that card!
Wait for just a minute, Eriol-kun!
discard thine old form and be reborn.
Under the name of Sakura, thy new Mistress.
It takes a lot of my strength to stop time'
I wonder if they are ok?
I will go look for them.
She seems to have tired herself out.
What I am afraid of is
But it seems I cannot help that, can I?
